name: finland-aurora-notifier-lambda
description: AWS Lambda web-scraper which sends notification to pre-defined email/sms address if the Finnish Meteorological Institute Aurora Forecast shows promising activity at selected observation station.

scripts.invoke-local: sam build && sam local invoke CheckAurorasFunction --parameter-overrides "ScrapeUrl=$SCRAPE_URL" "Station=$STATION" "DeliveryMethod=$DELIVERY_METHOD" "EmailRecipient=$EMAIL_RECIPIENT" "EmailSender=$EMAIL_SENDER" "SmsPhoneNumber=$SMS_PHONE_NUMBER" "SmsSenderId=$SMS_SENDER_ID"
